item.title: Reducing Call Center Costs
item.description: Running a call center, whether onshore or offshore, comes with inherent costs. While labor is a significant factor, telecommunications expenses shouldn’t be overlooked, especially with larger centers. These expenses can quickly escalate due to high call volumes and data usage. Fortunately, there are ways to reduce these costs without compromising service quality. Many assume they already have the best deals on voice and data services, especially with high usage. However, this might not be the case.
